message: Anyone try out the demo? On the one hand, the weapons and desctruction effects are kind of cool. On the other, isn't this an open-world game any more?

It's been known from the start that it wouldn't be an ope-world game anymore, which is a bit sad. I still have to check out the demo, but as long as they have that nano rifle in Armageddon, I'll be happy!

I'm willing to entertain the possibility that the demo offered up a bad slice of the final game. But -- I hated everything in it. Guerrilla wasn't perfect, but it was bold. Making you an exterminator in a cramped cave is not bold, guys.
